Scientists have found a great paradox in nature – clean air is enhancing global warming, while pollution keeps our planet cool.
A team of international researchers determined current pollution rates… [+502 chars]

articles.title: NASA's IASC appreciates Shrutitirtha Tamojit Bhattacharjee's provisional detection of the asteroid belt; Here's the story of 'Curious Stargazer' - Barak Bulletin
articles.description: Shrutitirtha Tamojit Bhattacharjee wants to further study Planetary Geology to convert his passion for stargazing into a full-time profession of discovering uncharted zones on the surface of the moon, mars
articles.content: Silchar-boy, Shrutitirtha Bhattacharjee who identifies himself as a “Curious Stargazer” has been recognised by NASA’s International Astronomical Search Collaboration (IASC) for the “Provisional Disco… [+3717 chars]
